00024   inline bool read_access_test (const std::string& name) {
00025     return (access (name.c_str(), R_OK) == 0); 
00026   }

00032   template <typename T> 
00033     std::string AddCommas(T data) { 
00034     std::stringstream ss; ss << data; std::string s = ss.str();
00035     if (s.length() > 3)
00036       for (int i = s.length()-3; i > 0; i -= 3)
00037         s.insert(i,",");
00038     return s;
00039   }

00041   inline void displayRuntime(const timespec start) {
00042     
00043     struct timespec finish;
00044     clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC, &finish);
00045     double elapsed = (finish.tv_sec - start.tv_sec);
00046     int t = clock()/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00047     int min = (int)floor(elapsed / 60.0);
00048     int sec = (int)(elapsed-min*60);
00049     char buffer[100];
00050     sprintf (buffer, "CPU: %4dm%02ds Wall: %4dm%02ds", 
00051              (int)floor( ((double)t) /60.0), t % 60, min, sec);
00052     printf ("%s",buffer);
00053   }
00054 
00057   inline void rcomplement(std::string &a) {
00058     
00059     std::reverse(&a[0], &a[a.size()]);
00060     std::string::iterator it = a.begin();
00061     for (; it != a.end(); it++)
00062       if (*it == 'A')
00063         *it = 'T';
00064       else if (*it == 'T')
00065         *it = 'A';
00066       else if (*it == 'C')
00067         *it = 'G';
00068       else
00069         *it = 'C';
00070   }
00071   
00072   // calculate the percentage
00073   template <typename T> inline int percentCalc(T numer, T denom) {
00074     if (denom <= 0)
00075       return 0;
00076     int perc  = static_cast<int>(floor((float)numer / (float)denom * 100.0));
00077     return perc;
00078   }

00080   // remove the last character from a string
00081   inline std::string cutLastChar(std::string in) {
00082     if (in.length() == 0)
00083       return in;
00084     else 
00085       return in.substr(0, in.length() - 1);
00086   }
00087   
00088   // remove substrings from a string
00089  inline std::string scrubString(std::string toscrub, std::string toremove) {
00090    std::string::size_type i = toscrub.find(toremove);
00091    while (i != std::string::npos) {
00092      toscrub.erase(i, toremove.length());
00093      i = toscrub.find(toremove);
00094    }
00095    return toscrub;
00096  }

00108  inline size_t countLines(const std::string &file, const std::string &exclude = "", const std::string &include = "") {
00109    
00110    //open the file
00111    igzstream inFile(file.c_str());
00112    if (!inFile) 
00113      return 0;
00114    
00115    // loop through the file
00116    size_t count = 0;
00117    std::string dum;
00118    while (std::getline(inFile, dum)) {
00119      if (!include.length() || (dum.find(include) != std::string::npos)) // file must have include
00120        if (!exclude.length() || (dum.find(exclude) == std::string::npos)) // and not have exclude
00121          count++;
00122      
00123    }
00124    
00125    return count;
00126  }
